data.actual_result: The text field either expands or disappears
data.expected_result: The text field should remain the same size
data.short_description: Starting/ending calls on another device alters the text field size
data.steps_to_repro: - On iOS, open a DM and tap the text field to open the keyboard - On another device (e.g. Desktop), open the same DM and start a call with that user - On iOS, observe that the text field has expanded in size - Tap on the text area and then back on the field to reset its size - Get the user to leave the call - Observe that the text field has disappeared
